original_title: “PUTHIYA PAATHAI” The new social-intellectual discussion program Live on SHAKTHI TV every Friday at 10:30 p.m.
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka intensifies Operation Yukthiya with Police deployment surge and stricter legal oversight.
Sri Lankan workers of two closed-down Jordan garment factories to be repatriated after legal proceedings
Sri Lanka Air Force launches investigations into Mi-17 helicopter accident
